alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Huron; Lorain; Medina; Summit (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 5:56PM EDT until July 26 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Huron County in north central Ohio... Medina County in northeastern Ohio... Cuyahoga County in northeastern Ohio... Summit County in northeastern Ohio... Lorain County in north central Ohio... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 555 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles north of Lakewood to near Grafton to near Wellington, moving east-northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Akron, Lorain, Elyria, Medina, Vermilion, Parma, Lakewood, Cuyahoga Falls, Euclid, Mentor, Cleveland Heights, Strongsville, Brunswick, Westlake, North Royalton, North Ridgeville, Kent, Solon and Avon Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
